Monologue.Original: “You don’t seem to have enough money...”

Monologue.Current: Receptionist{Line}“Ms. Julia is waiting in her room.”

Monologue.Current: “Большое спасибо.{Line} Приятно отдыха.”

Monologue.Original: “Thank you very much.{Line} We hope to see you back soon.”

Monologue.Current: Queen{Line}“I am the Queen of Cards. I travel{Line} all over the world to monitor and{Line} enforce the various card rules.”
Monologue.Original: Queen{Line}“I am the Queen of Cards. I travel{Line} all over the world to monitor and{Line} enforce the various card rules.”

Monologue.Current: Queen{Line}“What do you want to know?”{Line}(This region’s rules){Line}(The current trend of the trading rules){Line}(How are the rules passed on?)
Monologue.Original: Queen{Line}“What do you want to know?”{Line}(This region’s rules){Line}(The current trend of the trading rules){Line}(How are the rules passed on?)

Monologue.Current: Queen{Line}“Basically, each region{Line} has its own rules.”{Next}“The rules you’re carrying{Line} are passed on as you travel{Line} to various regions.”{Next}“As for the trading rules, they gradually{Line} spread out from a region where the{Line} card game is most popular.”{Next}“Of course, this region can change constantly{Line} depending on your course and actions.”{Next}“Also, my presence in a region{Line} can change its trading rules{Line} at times.”
Monologue.Original: Queen{Line}“Basically, each region{Line} has its own rules.”{Next}“The rules you’re carrying{Line} are passed on as you travel{Line} to various regions.”{Next}“As for the trading rules, they gradually{Line} spread out from a region where the{Line} card game is most popular.”{Next}“Of course, this region can change constantly{Line} depending on your course and actions.”{Next}“Also, my presence in a region{Line} can change its trading rules{Line} at times.”
